aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content1: We are a family-owned company with over 9-years’ of experience in food industry. We are manufacturing bread proofing baskets from natural rattan material, without any chemicals or bleaches.
aboutUs.content2: Every our product is handmade, with the utmost care. Paying great attention to the production process, we can ensure very high quality of our products.

material.content:
We use only natural rattan material for the bread proofing baskets production.

No bleaches, no chemicals.

Our baskets are handmade, therefore every rattan stick is carefully checked before use.

certificate.header: SGS Test Reports and PZH Certificate
certificate.inAccrodance: Our baskets can safely have contact with food, in accordance with:
certificate.point1: Regulation (EC) No 1935/2004 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 October 2004 on materials and articles intended to come into contact with food
certificate.point2: Germany LFGB (LMBG) Food and Feed Law Art. 30, 31

tailored.content:
You can order a bread proofing basket from our wide range of shapes and sizes or create your own unique basket. We can customize dimensions, shapes or add an engraving.

We are open for your ideas and suggestions!

description.paragraph1: Proofing baskets are used almost in every modern and artisan bakery. They are designed for proofing and fermenting bread dough, which is holding up, do not pours out and is higher after baking. Proofing in baskets helps to make the structure of the bread better and gives more crispy crust because it holds warmth and absorbs part of the moisture.
description.paragraph2: Our baskets are made of natural rattan or natural rattan combined with wood base element. We don’t use bleaches, lacquers or preservatives.
description.paragraph3: We use very long staples to improve our basket’s stability and indestructibility. SGS test reports and PZH Certificate prove high quality of our materials, so that they can safely have contact with food, in accordance with:
description.paragraph4: Each bread proofing basket is handmade. You can order numerous different shapes and sizes - round, oblong, oval, square and others. They are made from rattan only or rattan with wooden base. In our offer you can also find baskets with engraving - you can have one from our patterns or put your own design in place. Your own shape or logo can make the bread look unique and create excellent free advertisement.

description.paragraph1: Many bakers and home users prefer to use bread proofing baskets covered with liners. They help to keep the basket clean for longer time and are very helpful with very hydrated, sticky bread doughs.
description.paragraph2: Our liners are handmade from high quality material, which is a combination of line and cotton. This fabrics mix ensures resistance to washing at high temperatures. They are featured with elastic band which holds them in the place on the baskets and have double stitches, which make liners stronger.
description.paragraph3: Using liners saves the time for bakers, who doesn't have to clean the baskets so often. They are cut to conform to the shape of the basket, so it's less likely to get folds and wrinkles from the cloth showing up in the crust of the bread than when using the plain piece of cloth.
description.paragraph4: The cloths are used to cover the inside of the bannetons but they are not required.
description.warning: Note: Baskets with liners can be used only for proofing bread dough, never for baking bread in high temperatures!

description.paragraph1: Wooden baking trays are designed for baking mini breads or small cakes in the oven. They are ideal for giving them as a gift, they can also be an exceptional product that customers will notice and appreciate. Just cover the form with baking paper attached, fill in the cake and bake in the oven as usual. After baking, the wood darkens slightly as it is designed for single use, however, it is possible to use it multiple times. Just put the new baking paper inside the form and enjoy another well shaped bread or cake.
description.paragraph2: Molds are made of 100% natural poplar wood, they are biodegradable and recyclable, therefore can be composted safely. Molds tolerate temperatures ranging from -40°C to +220°C (-104°F to +428°F).

contact.text:
We are available to answer your questions and quotation requests from Monday to Friday in the regular business hours. We do our best to reply within 24 hours, if your matter is urgent do not hesitate to call us on the below numbers (Polish or English).

We accept emails in any languange.

productInfo.title: Product Information
productInfo.line1: Made of natural rattan or natural rattan combined with wood base element
productInfo.line2: Best for making healthy artisan bread
productInfo.line3: Perfect for bakeries, bread shops and for home use
productInfo.line4: Helps to make the structure and shape of the bread better and gives more crispy crust because it holds warmth and absorbs part of the moisture
productInfo.line5: Gives gorgeous pattern of floury rings circling the deep-golden crust
productInfo.line7: Each bread proofing basket is handmade
productInfo.line8: Does not contain any bleaches, lacquers or preservatives
productInfo.line9: SGS test reports and PZH Certificate prove high quality of our materialsused for proofing baskets made of rattan, so that they can safely have contact with food, in accordance with:
productInfo.line9.1: Regulation (EC) No 1935/2004 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 October 2004 on materials and articles intended to come into contact with food and
productInfo.line9.2: German LFGB (LMBG) Food and Feed Law Art. 30, 31
productInfo.line10: It can also be used as a decoration
productInfo.line11: Sizes table above shows most popular dimensions of proofing baskets
productInfo.line13: Presented sizes are external dimensions (± 5 mm)
productInfo.line14: Baskets can be used only for proofing bread dough, never for baking bread in high temperatures!

productDetails.entirelyRattan: Entirely made out of natural rattan
